scripts.a11y: npm run build && axe file://$PWD/_site/index.html file://$PWD/_site/about-dh-stanford/index.html file://$PWD/_site/projects/index.html --tags wcag2a,wcag2aa,wcag21aa
scripts.a11y:full: npm run build && find _site -name 'index.html' | head -20 | xargs axe --tags wcag2a,wcag2aa,wcag21aa
